inclusion.criterion: pregnant women with 10°± 2 weeks of gestation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: women in whom embryo transfer is expected within 60 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: euthyroid women (0.4 μIU/ml < TSH < 2.5 μIU/ml), positive for TPOab and/or TgAb, not assuming LT4 replacement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: euthyroid women (0.4 μIU/ml < TSH < 2.5 μIU/ml), positive for TPOab and/or TgAb under LT4 replacement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: women with TSH > 2.5 μIU/ml positive for TPOab and/or TgAb, not assuming LT4 replacement (requiring the beginning of LT4 replacement)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: women with TSH > 2.5 μIU/ml positive for TPOab and/or TgAb, under LT4 replacement (requiring an adjustment of LT4 replacement)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: use of dietary supplements containing selenium in the previous 4 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of hyperthyroidism positive anti-thyrotropin ab
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and is on Levothyroxine replacement. Her symptoms improved significantly after starting treatment.
